statements: DELETE FROM LeadScoringModels WHERE lead_id = 1 AND lead_score > 80;
DELETE FROM LeadScoringModels WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' AND lead_name LIKE '%John%'
DELETE FROM lead_scores WHERE score_value > 80 AND score_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LeadInteraction WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND interaction_result = 'Success';
DELETE FROM lead_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Webinar' AND activity_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 10 AND lead_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM lead_activities WHERE lead_id = 5 AND activity_type = 'Email' AND activity_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM lead_interaction WHERE lead_id = 3 AND interaction_type = 'email';
